universum.studios.android.ui

Class UiConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.ui.UiConfig

  • public final class UiConfig
extends Object
    Configuration options for the UI library.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long ANIMATION_DURATION_LONG
      Long duration for animation.
      static long ANIMATION_DURATION_MEDIUM
      Medium duration for animation.
      static long ANIMATION_DURATION_SHORT
      Short duration for animation.
      static long ANIMATION_FRAME_UPDATE_INTERVAL
      Update interval for animation frames in milliseconds.
      static boolean DEBUG_LOG_ENABLED
      Flag indicating whether the debug output for the UI library trough log-cat is enabled or not.
      static Locale DEFAULT_LOCALE
      Locale used as default across the UI widgets when the current locale does not provide valid values to be displayed in the UI, for example when displaying names of days of week or months.
      static boolean LOG_ENABLED
      Flag indicating whether the output for the UI library trough log-cat is enabled or not.
      static boolean MATERIALIZED
      Flag indicating whether the current device is running Android edition that supports material design features or not.
      static boolean MATERIALIZED_LOLLIPOP
      Flag indicating whether the current device is running materialized LOLLIPOP Android version or newest version.
      static boolean MATERIALIZED_MARSHMALLOW
      Flag indicating whether the current device is running materialized MARSHMALLOW Android version or newest version.
      static int VELOCITY_UNITS
      Units for velocity used in touch tracking operations.

    • Field Detail

      • LOG_ENABLED

        public static boolean LOG_ENABLED
        Flag indicating whether the output for the UI library trough log-cat is enabled or not.

      • DEBUG_LOG_ENABLED

        public static boolean DEBUG_LOG_ENABLED
        Flag indicating whether the debug output for the UI library trough log-cat is enabled or not.

      • MATERIALIZED

        public static final boolean MATERIALIZED
        Flag indicating whether the current device is running Android edition that supports material design features or not.
        See Also:
        MATERIALIZED_LOLLIPOP, MATERIALIZED_MARSHMALLOW

      • MATERIALIZED_LOLLIPOP

        public static final boolean MATERIALIZED_LOLLIPOP
        Flag indicating whether the current device is running materialized LOLLIPOP Android version or newest version.

      • MATERIALIZED_MARSHMALLOW

        public static final boolean MATERIALIZED_MARSHMALLOW
        Flag indicating whether the current device is running materialized MARSHMALLOW Android version or newest version.

      • VELOCITY_UNITS

        public static final int VELOCITY_UNITS
        Units for velocity used in touch tracking operations.

        Value: one pixel per second

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ANIMATION_FRAME_UPDATE_INTERVAL

        public static final long ANIMATION_FRAME_UPDATE_INTERVAL
        Update interval for animation frames in milliseconds. This interval determines how often should be frames of a specific animation invalidated.

        Value: 60 fps

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ANIMATION_DURATION_SHORT

        public static final long ANIMATION_DURATION_SHORT
        Short duration for animation.

        Value: 150 ms

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ANIMATION_DURATION_MEDIUM

        public static final long ANIMATION_DURATION_MEDIUM
        Medium duration for animation.

        Value: 300 ms

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ANIMATION_DURATION_LONG

        public static final long ANIMATION_DURATION_LONG
        Long duration for animation.

        Value: 500 ms

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_LOCALE

        public static final Locale DEFAULT_LOCALE
        Locale used as default across the UI widgets when the current locale does not provide valid values to be displayed in the UI, for example when displaying names of days of week or months.
